市場価格: (しじょうかかく) - market price or value
市場分析: (しじょうぶんせき) - market analysis
市場占有率: (しじょうせんゆうりつ) - market share
市場可能性: (いちばかのうせい) - market potential
市場均衡: (しじょうきんこう) - market equilibrium
市場展開: (しじょうてんかい) - market expansion
市場成長: (しじょうせいちょう) - market growth
市場拡大: (しじょうかくだい) - market expansion
市場撤退: (しじょうてったい) - pulling out of a market; withdrawing from a market
市場改革: (しじょうかいかく) - market reform
市場構造: (しじょうこうぞう) - market structure
市場環境: (しじょうかんきょう) - market environment
市場経済: (しじょうけいざい) - market economy
市場経済化: (しじょうけいざいか) - moving to a market-oriented economy; market-oriented economic reform
市場統合: (しじょうとうごう) - market integration; market consolidation
市場自由化: (しじょうじゆうか) - market liberalization; market liberalisation; opening up of a market
市場調査: (しじょうちょうさ) - market research
市場調査機関: (しじょうちょうさきかん) - market research organization; market research organisation
市場開拓: (しじょうかいたく) - market development
市外: (しがい) - (ant: 市内) outside the city area; suburbs
市外局番: (しがいきょくばん) - (telephone) area code
市女笠: (いちめがさ) - straw hat worn by women
市姫: (いちひめ) - female guardian deity of the market
市子: (いちこ) - sorceress/medium/female fortuneteller; (市子 only)  child from the city
市庁舎: (しちょうしゃ) - town hall; city hall
市役所: (しやくしょ) - municipal office; council; city hall
市条例: (しじょうれつ) - city ordinance; municipal ordinance
市松人形: (いちまつにんぎょう) - traditional Japanese doll
市松模様: (いちまつもよう) - checks; check (checkered, chequered) pattern; checkerboard
市民: (shimin) - cidadão, cidadania, público; habitante da cidade, moradores da cidade, cidadão, cidadania, público; habitante da cidade, moradores da cidade; burguesia, classe média
市民会館: (しみんかいかん) - City meeting hall
市民大会: (しみんたいかい) - citizens' rally; mass meeting
市民教育: (しみんきょういく) - civic education; education for citizenship
市民権: (しみんけん) - citizenship; civic rights; civil rights
市民活動: (しみんかつどう) - civic activity; activities initiated by the citizens themselves
市民的不服従: (しみんてきふふくじゅう) - civil disobedience
市民運動: (しみんうんどう) - citizens' campaign; citizens' group
市民階級: (しみんかいきゅう) - middle class; bourgeoisie
市民革命: (しみんかくめい) - people's or popular revolution
市神: (いちがみ) - city god; guardian deity of a city and esp. its marketplace
市立: (いちりつ) - (いちりつ spoken to avoid confusion with 私立)  municipal; city
市立図書館: (しりつとしょかん) - city library; municipal library; public library
市立病院: (しりつびょういん) - city hospital; municipal hospital
市章: (ししょう) - city symbol; city emblem
市街: (しがい) - urban areas; the streets; town; city
市街化区域: (しがいかくいき) - area zoned for urbanization (urbanisation)
市街地: (shigaichi) - área urbana, área urbana, área metropolitana, área construída
市街局番: (しがいきょくばん) - (telephone) area code
市街戦: (しがいせん) - street fighting; urban warfare
市議: (しぎ) - city councillor; city councilor; city assemblyman
市議会議員: (しぎかいぎいん) - city council member
市販: (shihan) - selling on the market (no mercado, nas lojas, etc.), making something commercially available; commercial (e.g. software), over-the-counter, off-the-shelf, store-bought
市販品: (しはんひん) - goods on the market
市長村長選挙: (しちょうそんちょうせんきょ) - mayoral election
市長町長選挙: (しちょうちょうちょうせんきょ) - mayoral election
